subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: The 15-year-old Ryan Harrison is confident of advancing in the United States Clay Court Championships. Harrison, a qualifier, joined Rafael Nadal and Richard Gasquet as the only players since 1990 to win ATP matches under the age of 16.
snippet: The 15-year-old Ryan Harrison is confident of advancing in the United States Clay Court Championships. Harrison, a qualifier, joined Rafael Nadal and Richard Gasquet as the only players since 1990 to win ATP matches under the age of 16.
